name: Anathema [Unfinished Game.. for now.]
description:
Arrows key and space to interact! You can attack with left click but.. dont worry about it.

Well, deep in the heart of the forest lives a small village guarded by an eternal lantern. However, the creatures of the forest snatched it up and stole it, retreating deep into the forest and hiding away. Unfortunately, the dev team didnt have time to finish this (it's out first game!) but we're gonna keep updating it in the future!!! Stay tuned if the total of 3 characters engages you!
